title: Original UNLEASHED Guitarist FREDRIK LINDGREN Has Died
description: Lindgren played for Unleashed between 1989 and 1995.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: Lindgren played for Unleashed between 1989 and 1995.
text: Original Unleashed guitarist Fredrik Lindgren has died. Lindgren played for Unleashed between 1989 and 1995, and performed on their first four albums – Where No Life Dwells, Shadows In The Deep, Across The Open Sea, and Victory. Lindgren also played in bands like Terra Firma and Atlantic Tide. "Warriors!!! Sadly, the news have reached us that Fredrik Lindgren, lead guitar of Unleashed 1989-1995 has passed away," wrote Unleashed on their social media. "Fredrik was a huge part of the early history of the band. For this we are eternally grateful. See you in Valhalla brother! Johnny & The Boys" Want More Metal? html:
Original Unleashed guitarist Fredrik Lindgren has died. Lindgren played for Unleashed between 1989 and 1995, and performed on their first four albums – Where No Life Dwells, Shadows In The Deep, Across The Open Sea, and Victory. Lindgren also played in bands like Terra Firma and Atlantic Tide.

"Warriors!!! Sadly, the news have reached us that Fredrik Lindgren, lead guitar of Unleashed 1989-1995 has passed away," wrote Unleashed on their social media. "Fredrik was a huge part of the early history of the band. For this we are eternally grateful. See you in Valhalla brother! Johnny & The Boys"
